Section 1: Expressing the Meaning. As for the difference in appearance between monks and laypeople, the pure and defiled paths are distinct.

If you want to observe the style of flourishing benevolence and righteousness,

Those who can cut off affection, leave their parents, abandon glory and power,
eat simple food and coarse vegetables, and practice asceticism,
wear coarse clothes to cover their bodies without caring for adornments,
use what is needed to sustain their bodies without seeking fame and profit,
suppress the three poisons and restrain the eight sounds,
the three thousand dignified behaviors and the five hundred precepts,
moving and still in accord with propriety, all have rules and regulations.

expounding the teachings according to the capacities of the audience, benefiting beings according to the times,
can be said to be the model for humans and gods,
the boat and oars for entering the way.
